verses.verse: Say <S%H559><s%> to your brothers, <S%H251><s%> "Ammi, <S%H5971><s%>" and to your sisters, <S%H269><s%> "Ruhamah. <S%H7355><s%>"

"Contend <S%H7378><s%> with your mother, <S%H517><s%> contend, <S%H7378><s%> For she is not my wife, <S%H802><s%> and I am not her husband; <S%H376><s%> And let her put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> her harlotry <S%H2183><s%> from her face, <S%H6440><s%> And her adultery <S%H5005><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> her breasts, <S%H7699><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> I strip <S%H6584><s%> her naked <S%H6174><s%> And expose <S%H3322><s%> her as on the day <S%H3117><s%> when she was born. <S%H3205><s%> I will also make <S%H7760><s%> her like a wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Make <S%H7896><s%> her like desert <S%H6723><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> And slay <S%H4191><s%> her with thirst. <S%H6772><s%>
"Also, I will have <S%H7355><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on her children, <S%H1121><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> they are children <S%H1121><s%> of harlotry. <S%H2183><s%>

"For their mother <S%H517><s%> has played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot; <S%H2181><s%> She who conceived <S%H2029><s%> them has acted <S%H954><s%> shamefully. <S%H954><s%> For she said, <S%H559><s%> 'I will go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> my lovers, <S%H157><s%> Who give <S%H5414><s%> [me] my bread <S%H3899><s%> and my water, <S%H4325><s%> My wool <S%H6785><s%> and my flax, <S%H6593><s%> my oil <S%H8081><s%> and my drink. <S%H8250><s%>'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will hedge <S%H7753><s%> up her way <S%H1870><s%> with thorns, <S%H9359><s%> And I will build <S%H1443><s%> a wall <S%H1447><s%> against her so that she cannot <S%H3808><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> her paths. <S%H9350><s%>

"And she will pursue <S%H7291><s%> her lovers, <S%H157><s%> but she will not overtake <S%H5381><s%> them; And she will seek <S%H1245><s%> them, but will not find <S%H4672><s%> [them.] Then she will say, <S%H559><s%> 'I will go <S%H1980><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to my first <S%H7223><s%> husband, <S%H376><s%> For it was better <S%H2896><s%> for me then <S%H227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> now! <S%H6258><s%>'

"For she does not know <S%H3045><s%> that it was I who gave <S%H5414><s%> her the grain, <S%H1715><s%> the new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> and the oil, <S%H3323><s%> And lavished <S%H7235><s%> on her silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> [Which] they used <S%H6213><s%> for Baal. <S%H1168><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> I will take <S%H3947><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> My grain <S%H1715><s%> at harvest time <S%H6256><s%> And My new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> in its season. <S%H4150><s%> I will also take <S%H5337><s%> away <S%H5337><s%> My wool <S%H6785><s%> and My flax <S%H6593><s%> [Given] to cover <S%H3680><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

"And then <S%H6258><s%> I will uncover <S%H1540><s%> her lewdness <S%H5040><s%> In the sight <S%H5869><s%> of her lovers, <S%H157><s%> And no <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H376><s%> will rescue <S%H5337><s%> her out of My hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"I will also put <S%H7673><s%> an end <S%H7673><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> her gaiety, <S%H4885><s%> Her feasts, <S%H2282><s%> her new <S%H2320><s%> moons, <S%H2320><s%> her sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> her festal <S%H4150><s%> assemblies. <S%H4150><s%>

"And I will destroy <S%H8074><s%> her vines <S%H1612><s%> and fig <S%H8384><s%> trees, <S%H8384><s%> Of which <S%H834><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> 'These <S%H1992><s%> are my wages <S%H866><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> my lovers <S%H157><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> me.' And I will make <S%H7760><s%> them a forest, <S%H9194><s%> And the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> them.

"And I will punish <S%H6485><s%> her for the days <S%H3117><s%> of the Baals <S%H1168><s%> When <S%H834><s%> she used to offer <S%H6999><s%> sacrifices <S%H6999><s%> to them And adorn <S%H5710><s%> herself with her earrings <S%H5141><s%> and jewelry, <S%H2484><s%> And follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> her lovers, <S%H157><s%> so that she forgot <S%H7911><s%> Me," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will allure <S%H6601><s%> her, Bring <S%H1980><s%> her into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> And speak <S%H1696><s%> kindly <S%H3820><s%> to her.

"Then I will give <S%H5414><s%> her her vineyards <S%H3754><s%> from there, <S%H8033><s%> And the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%> as a door <S%H6607><s%> of hope. <S%H8615><s%> And she will sing <S%H9420><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her youth, <S%H5271><s%> As in the day <S%H3117><s%> when she came <S%H5927><s%> up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day, <S%H3117><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "That you will call <S%H7121><s%> Me Ishi <S%H376><s%> And will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Me Baali. <S%H1180><s%>

"For I will remove <S%H5493><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the Baals <S%H1168><s%> from her mouth, <S%H6310><s%> So that they will be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> by their names <S%H8034><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>

"In that day <S%H3117><s%> I will also make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> for them With the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> The birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> And the creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%> And I will abolish <S%H7665><s%> the bow, <S%H7198><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and war <S%H4421><s%> from the land, <S%H776><s%> And will make them lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>

"And I will betroth <S%H781><s%> you to Me forever; <S%H5769><s%> Yes, I will betroth <S%H781><s%> you to Me in righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and in justice, <S%H4941><s%> In lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and in compassion, <S%H7356><s%>
And I will betroth <S%H781><s%> you to Me in faithfulness. <S%H530><s%> Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day <S%H3117><s%> that I will respond, <S%H6030><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> I will respond <S%H6030><s%> to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and they will respond <S%H6030><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%>

And the earth <S%H776><s%> will respond <S%H6030><s%> to the grain, <S%H1715><s%> to the new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> and to the oil, <S%H3323><s%> And they will respond <S%H6030><s%> to Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

"And I will sow <S%H2232><s%> her for Myself in the land. <S%H776><s%> I will also have <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on her who had not obtained <S%H7355><s%> compassion, <S%H7355><s%> And I will say <S%H559><s%> to those who were not My people, <S%H5971><s%> 'You are My people! <S%H5971><s%>' And they will say, <S%H559><s%> '[Thou art] my God! <S%H430><s%>'"
